resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158093</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158093</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1034</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Modern Communication Acronyms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Moderne Kommunikation Akronyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acronymes Modernes de Transmission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acrônimos Modernos De uma Comunicação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acronimi Moderni Di Comunicazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγχρονα αρκτικόλεξα επικοινωνίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Siglas Modernas De la Comunicación</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity the learners will learn some of the more common acronyms used in email messages, chats and sms messages and what they mean.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acronyms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">email messages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chats sms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität erlernen die Anfänger einige
der geläufigeren Akronyme, die in den email Meldungen, in den 
Schwätzchen und in den sms Meldungen und was sie, verwendet werden 
bedeuten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants apprendront 
certains des acronymes plus communs utilisés dans des messages 
d'email, des causeries et des messages de sms et ce que veulent dire 
ils.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners aprenderão alguns dos
acrônimos mais comuns usados em mensagens do email, em bate-papos e 
em mensagens dos sms e o que significam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività i principianti impareranno 
alcuni degli acronimi più comuni usati nei messaggi del email, nelle 
chiacchierate e nei messaggi degli sms e che cosa significano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα μάθουν 
μερικών από τα πιό κοινά αρκτικόλεξα που χρησιμοποιούνται στα 
μηνύματα, τις συνομιλίες και sms τα μηνύματα ηλεκτρονικού 
ταχυδρομείου και τι σημαίνουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes aprenderán 
algunas de las siglas más comunes usadas en mensajes del email, 
charlas y mensajes de los sms y qué significan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Akronyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">email Meldungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">plaudert sms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">acronymes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">messages d'email</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cause des sms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acrônimos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mensagens do email</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chats sms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acronimi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">messaggi del email</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chiacchiera gli sms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρκτικόλεξα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηνύματα ηλεκτρονικού ταχυδρομείου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κουβεντιάζει sms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">siglas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mensajes del email</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">charla sms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
